About Me

Here are some few things about me.

April Anne Gaza Brabante

Hello there I'm April. A full stack developer currently residing in the Philippines who knew basic Japanese language. Aside from being a developer, I'm a person who enjoys music a lot. Sometimes, I practice playing guitar and ukelele. A competitive person and outgoing one who loves to hang out and organize event whenever I have free time. I believe in the old adage that humans should thrive and not just survive. Also, I do love to exercise and play with my cats. I graduated from Palawan State University with a degree of Bachelor of Science in Computer Science(2010).

STI Palawan

Instructor

I was an IT Instructor for 8 months who trained freshmen the basics of Microsoft Office such as Word, Excel, Powerpoint and the likes. I also taught basic programming using Java and C programming language as well as fundamentals of HTML.

Teleserv

Call Center Agent

I worked as a BPO agent for 4 months with an account under Touch Mobile(TM), a cellular service provider here in the Philippines. My tasks was to answer queries and perform troubleshooting for our clients.

SDMI(SHI Designing and Manufacturing Inc.)

Full Stack Developer

I've been working as a full stack developer for a decade. I've been handling various programmin languages such as Java, Python, VBA, Visual Basic and Oracle Developer. Mostly, my tasks are maintaining the systems and conducting version upgrades when necessary. Currently, I'm working under Technology Group, who is responsible for the research and development of system using new technology.
